heading: EXCLUSIVE Bhutan | FREE Tiger Nest Hiking Experience

itinerary.dayHeading: Arrival in Siliguri | Transfer to Phuentsholing
itinerary.dayOverview: Upon arrival in Siliguri, get transferred to the hotel in Phuentsholing and check-in. You can relax for the day or self-explore the city by visiting places like the Bhutan Gate, Zangto Pelri, etc. Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

Check-out and get transferred to Thimphu. After arrival, check-in at the hotel. You may take rest or set out to self-explore the city by visiting attractions like the Clock Tower Square, Simply Bhutan, Royal Botanical Garden, etc. Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.

itinerary.dayHeading: Thimphu Sightseeing Tour | Transfer to Paro
itinerary.dayOverview: Get assisted from the hotel for a sightseeing tour of Thimphu. Explore attractions like the National Memorial Chorten, and Buddha Statue, followed by a visit to the beautiful Tashichho Dzong and Simtokha Dzong. Later, get transferred to Paro and check-in at the hotel for an overnight stay.

Get assisted from the hotel for a hiking experience to the beautiful Taktsang Monastery. Enjoy an assisted walk through the pine forest, leading you to Tiger's Nest. Also, visit the Ta Dzong and Paro Rinpung Dzong. Later, get transferred back to the hotel for an overnight stay.

Check-out and get transferred to the hotel in Phuentsholing. After check-in, you can take the day to relax or explore the city by yourself by visiting attractions like Chukha Hydropower Dam, Alapan's View Point, etc. Later, return to the hotel on your own for an overnight stay.
After breakfast, check-out from the hotel and get transferred to the Bagdogra Airport/Railway Station. This is where your trip ends.

overView.heading: Bhutan: Land of Gross National Happiness
overView.text: Embark on an unforgettable journey through Bhutan, a land where Gross National Happiness takes precedence over material wealth. Explore the serene landscapes, vibrant culture, and ancient traditions that define the essence of this enchanting kingdom nestled in the Himalayas.

overView.heading: Gateway to Happiness: Phuentsholing's Tranquil Charm
overView.text: Discover the gateway to happiness in Phuentsholing, Bhutan's serene border town. Immerse yourself in its tranquil charm as you explore the Bhutan Gate, Zangto Pelri, and other cultural landmarks that offer a glimpse into the kingdom's unique identity and ethos.

overView.heading: Capital Splendor: Thimphu's Cultural Heritage and Scenic Beauty
overView.text: Experience the splendor of Bhutan's capital city, Thimphu, where cultural heritage and scenic beauty converge. Marvel at the ancient dzongs, stroll through bustling markets, and immerse yourself in the city's vibrant traditions that embody the spirit of Bhutanese life.

overView.heading: Spiritual Odyssey: Paro's Sacred Sites and Natural Wonders
overView.text: Embark on a spiritual odyssey in Paro, where sacred sites and natural wonders beckon travelers. Explore the historic forts, hike to the iconic Tiger's Nest Monastery, and immerse yourself in the tranquility of the Paro Valley, a haven of peace and serenity.

overView.heading: Enchanting Phuentsholing: Gateway to Bhutan's Southern Charms
overView.text: Experience the enchanting beauty of Phuentsholing, the gateway to Bhutan's southern charms. Discover Alapan's View Point, Chukha Hydropower Dam, and other scenic wonders that showcase the region's natural splendor and cultural richness.

overView.heading: Tiger's Nest Trek: A Journey to Spiritual Enlightenment
overView.text: Embark on the iconic Tiger's Nest Trek, a journey to spiritual enlightenment amidst breathtaking scenery. Traverse lush forests, cross cascading streams, and ascend to the legendary Taktsang Monastery, perched on a cliffside overlooking the Paro Valley.

overView.heading: Artisan Heritage: Bhutan's Time-Honored Crafts and Traditions
overView.text: Discover Bhutan's artisan heritage through its time-honored crafts and traditions. Explore local markets, interact with skilled artisans, and witness the intricate art of thangka painting, weaving, and woodcarving that embody the kingdom's rich cultural legacy.

overView.heading: Craft Your Bhutanese Adventure
overView.text: Craft your own adventure in Bhutan, a land where happiness is measured by the joy of the journey. Whether you seek spiritual enlightenment, cultural immersion, or scenic splendor, let Bhutan's timeless allure and mystical charm guide you on an unforgettable odyssey.
